title: Use of monitor-indices at v4.0.4 cannot sync beacon chain in goerli network
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description When using the command line option `monitor-indices`, prysm-beacon-chain `v4.0.4` cannot sync ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes, the previous version in which this bug was not present was: `v4.0.3` ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction 1. Include the following option in config file: ``` monitor-indices: [123456] ``` ## üî• Error 

May 16 15:41:16 eth-1 systemd[1]: Started Prysm Eth2 Beacon Chain.
May 16 15:41:16 eth-1 beacon-chain[32268]: time="2023-05-16 15:41:16" level=info msg="Finished reading JWT secret from /etc/eth2/jwtsecret"

If the `monitor-indices` option is removed for prysm-beacon-chain v4.0.4, the node can sync as usual.
